definitions.definition: A sharp, pointed, two-edged surgical instrument used in venesection and for opening abscesses etc.
A small, sterile single-use needle used to draw a drop of blood for testing, as with a glucometer .
An iron bar used for tapping a melting furnace.
A high narrow window , terminating in an acutely pointed arch, common in Gothic architecture.

main_definition: A sharp, pointed, two-edged surgical instrument used in venesection and for opening abscesses etc.
secondary_definitions: A small, sterile single-use needle used to draw a drop of blood for testing, as with a glucometer .
( metallurgy ) An iron bar used for tapping a melting furnace.
( architecture ) A high narrow window , terminating in an acutely pointed arch, common in Gothic architecture.
